# pycounts_gcoronel

Calculate word counts in a text file as described in the Python Packages book!

## Installation
I haven't tried this way:
```bash
$ pip install pycounts_gcoronel
```
But I tried this following the book:
```bash
$ conda activate pycounts_gcoronel
```
and then
```bash
$ poetry install
```
